snippet.title: Sniper Elite 3 Ultimate Edition – Reveal Trailer | Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Buy at Amazon (UK) – PS4/Xbox One: https://amzn.to/3cOfzoZ
Buy at Amazon (UK) – Nintendo Switch: https://amzn.to/2TVojBl
Buy at Amazon (USA) – PS4: https://amzn.to/2IBZZ2b
Buy at Amazon (USA) – Xbox One: https://amzn.to/3aFE1ai
Buy at Amazon (USA) – Nintendo Switch: https://amzn.to/2vdFFB5

Sniper Elite 3 Ultimate Edition is coming to the Switch in 2019, offering intense sniping in soaring temperatures, all on the go. 

This feature-complete experience includes all the additional content ever released for the game, and Switch-exclusive local wireless multiplayer and motion controls. 

Follow us on:
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official/
Mixer: https://mixer.com/rebellion_official 
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/sniperelitegame/ 
Twitter https://twitter.com/SniperElite  
Rebellion Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion 
Rebellion Game Store: https://games.rebellionstore.com/

#Rebellion #SniperElite3 #NintendoSwitch
